Allen Stone

From playing backwoods barbecues and community gatherings to selling out venues across the country, with a national TV appearance on Conan, Stone released his self-titled sophomore record in October on stickystones, his own independent label. The disc climbed the iTunes R&B/soul charts, peaking at #2, hitting #29 and #62 on BillboardÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Heatseekers and R&B/Hip-Hop Album charts.
